reviews.title: No more flaky skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my favorite lotion to take around with me. It's thick and hydrating, but not oily or sticky. I like the easy to apply tube, which lets me dispense just the right amount of product. I've been using it for a few days now, and the dry spots on my face are gone. Even my wife noticed how much better my skin looks. I'm happy with this product.

reviews.title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have to admit, I was very skeptical to use this lotion on my face because I have very sensitive skin, but using this face, neck and chest cream is my new favorite thing. It is instantly hydrating and does not clog pores. A little goes a long way!! Will be incorporating this into my skincare routine!!

reviews.title: Great ingredients!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm very picky about anything that goes on my facial skin, but I completely love Cetaphil and knew this would be a hit! It's lightweight, hydrating, and doesn't leave my combo oily skin feeling greasy. Love the ingredients in this one.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am glad I got and tried this cetaphil skin activator hydrating and firming neck, chest and face lotion. It is great. It has good ingredients and it is unscented. It is effective and makes my skin feel great. I like the texture and the packaging too. I would recommend it.

reviews.title: I love this!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This moisturizer is great for all skin types and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry. I would recommend giving it a try! I have noticed that my skin feels hydrated all day! I feel like I can see a difference in my crepey skin on my neck, chest, and even in the corners of my eyes. I would recommend these products!

reviews.title: Works great on face and neck area
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My wife and I have " older skin" and it doesn't bounce back like it use to. Cetaphil hydrating and firming cream felt amazing on my face and neck! We have both noticed a difference too. I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Beautiful hydration
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm very happy with my new hydrating cream for the face, neck, and chest. My dry, aging skin truly needs extra hydration and elasticity, and I can already see amazing results. The formula feels gentle with no irritation or discomfort, and I love that it's made with natural ingredients like CICA and mandelic acid. It comes in great packaging and is easy to apply definitely a win for mature skin care.

reviews.title: Firms the skin up
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is very effective and helps so much with aging skin. The feel.and texture of this product is very smooth. It doesn't have a scent, and that is perfect for me. I really enjoyed the easy to use packaging.

reviews.title: I like the cream..
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received a free product from Influenster and Cetaphil in exchange for my honest review. The product I received is Hydrating and Firming Cream Skin Activator. I've been loving this cream lately; it has a much thicker consistency compared to the lotion versions. It feels incredibly rich and luxurious on my skin, which is a real treat. I'm so happy with how it leaves my skin feeling, and it keeps it hydrated all day long. Even after washing my face, my skin still feels beautifully moisturized.

reviews.title: Refreshing cream for smoother skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This skin activator hydrating cream has been my nightly routine for about two weeks now. I love the fact that it scent free and it's for sensitive skin. I haven't broken out and it doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. I like the fact that it's a bit on the thicker cream side but not to thick and makes my skin feel smooth and refreshed.

reviews.title: Wonderful for the chest!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product was literally a godsend. I'm so happy to have been able to try the skin activator, hydrating, firming neck, chest and face cream and let me tell you I have put it in all of those places the ingredients sent and texture of the cream are just wonderful and they squeeze out so easily from the packaging and I've never had a chest before and this is just been so nice to try to rub on my chest. I feel so calm and I feel so smooth and now it's just so wonderful. Being able to try this wonderful cream.

reviews.title: a+
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] at first I thought this would be too thick for my face, but I really loved how this helped with dry patches that I have around my nose and on my upper cheekbones. I don't necessarily know if I need firming in my face or neck, but this felt good

reviews.title: Rich moisturizing cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am so happy with this new Skin Activator line from Cetaphil. The tube of Hydrating and Firming Cream very effective. This is thicker than a normal facial moisturizer so it takes less product to get good coverage. It softens and spreads nicely across the skin. I use it in the evenings for overnight moisturizing of my face, neck, and chest. I also like it during the day for quick moisture on my hands when they feel dry. It definitely hydrates my skin giving it a plumper, firmer, less crepey look. It is a heavier cream that I use in the evenings. It is gentle and has caused no irritation or breakouts. This is a high-quality product with the effectiveness you expect from Cetaphil. I like that it is packaged in this tube that is easy to open and easy to dispense just the amount of product I want. I can keep it on the counter or nightstand. It is also easy to carry in a bag when I am on the go so I can moisturize my skin whenever, wherever. I am very happy with the results I get from this cream.

reviews.title: Firmer, smoother skin that looks youthful!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was looking for a cream that would benefit my neck & chest because l have noticed wringle lines. I was skeptical at first that such a cream could benefit my neck & chest and make my areas of need look young again, but this is a great product! Super moisturizing, fast absorbing, and my skin stays so hydrated all day. The cream feels so silky and leaves my skin feelings so nice, I love this delicate skin-firming option. I'm very happy with the outcome of this cream. It is super lightweight and non greasy and has a very pleasant aroma to it. As you age, the neck is one of the most visible places for aging. With a high-quality product like this and with daily use, I can keep looking younger.

reviews.title: Best moisturizer I've used
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is by FAR the best moisturizer I've ever used, (and I've tried more than 20) Not only does my makeup look better with this moisturizer, but I started using it nightly for 2 weeks. In those 2 weeks I noticed a red rash I had started dissappearing, my pores improved, have you ever heard a moisturizer help with pores? I had not. My pores started minimizing and my face skin now looks moisturized and healthy. I'm glad it also works well under my makeup, and that the rash didn't come back. I was skeptical at the beginning because I have oily skin and the moisturizer is a thicker consistency, but boy was I wrong! I love that this moisturizer is easy to squeeze, it's very convenient for when I have long nails. I will definitely keep buying this over and over.

reviews.title: worth having
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using neck cream for years. I know many people don't care about their necks look, but I've definitely benefited from it. My neck looks younger than those of people a decade younger, with no noticeable wrinkles. This Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming neck, Chest & Face cream is worth having. Start using it now and you'll be pleasantly surprised.

reviews.title: Perfect for my hands and face! And doesn't clog p
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my favorite in this whole line of products! It has a perfect consistency that doesn't leave my skin feeling too wet and always relives the dryness my skin is prone to. It has no scent which I love as most lotions I put on my face have too strong of a smell. I've been using this line of products on my face neck and hands for several weeks and I've noticed the most difference on my hands which used to be incredibly dry and cracked. Thankful I found this product as it is helping an issue that other products failed to help.

reviews.title: Great everyday moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this daily on my face and neck. It definitely hydrates and feels really nice. I like the scent it has a light clean scent I'm so happy it's not heavily fragranced it's perfect for sensitive skin. I've noticed my skin is smooth and very hydrating. Definitely have been liking it. It's not sticky or heavy feeling which is perfect to layer under my makeup.

reviews.title: Very rich for deep moisturizing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] the Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream comes in a tube and is the thickest of the three formulas I tried. I have a large scar on my neck from a thyroid removal, and was interested how this formula would affect the scarred skin as well as my normal neck skin. A very small amount covers my whole neck, and takes a little effort to rub in evenly. It really does keep my skin hydrated until I shower next. Even after washing my skin feels less dry. Too much product makes my skin feel slightly greasy, but isn't unpleasant.

reviews.title: Hydration for the whole body
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been focusing more on my neck and chest area lately, and this cream has been a great addition to my routine. It feels silky and gives my skin a nice hydrated glow. I do think my skin texture in those areas looks smoother. I knocked off one star because the tube is on the smaller side, and I go through it pretty quickly

reviews.title: Very Hydrating!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this product twice daily per instructions for two weeks, and I have noticed a difference in my skin! It is also very hydrating and makes me feel more refreshed throughout the day! I will definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.title: Great daily facial moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this moisturizer every day on my face and neck. I love the light texture, because it does a great job locking in moisture but also does not feel greasy. The bottle is also easy to use and travel with and it will go a long way.

reviews.title: Too thick for me
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was happy to try this brand. This is supposed to help with firmness in the neck and chest area. The package is very easy to dispense but the crÃ¨me seemed a little too thick and too a bit for my skin to absorb it. I don't like that the second ingredient after water is seed oil. I think that is why this product is very thick and a little too heavy. I did try to use it however it did not absorb very well and I just wasn't a fan.

reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin too
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a creamy and thick cream but absorbs really fast and welll into my skin. I love the texture of this and the way it melts in and makes my skin so soft. I noticed a slight difference after a week of using this, my skin looks and feels more youthful, soft, hydrated, and firm. I love cetaphil because it works well and is great for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Great at soothing skin.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The cetaphil activator hydrating and firming neck, chest, and face cream was great! It helped me out on my neck and chest after going to Disney and getting a bit of a sunburn. It's thick and helpful and has no scent, which is great. I didn't use it much on my face because it felt a little too thick but I did use it on my shoulders. It helped a lot. It's a good product.

reviews.title: Smooth
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm so excited to have received this form of cream. I'm 50 years old, and though I don't look my age, I love that I can start using this cream to slow down the signs of aging. I can't wait to see the difference in my fine lines around my neck and chest area. However, I will not be using this on my face only because I have oily skin and already have a great skincare line going right now. I don't want it to make my face skin look more greasy than it already can get. But I definitely love it for the neck and chest area!

reviews.title: Helps with dryness!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At the age of 54, I can slowly see the unpreventable aging process of my skin. Using Cetaphil has helped with the dryness in the two weeks I've used it. I imagine what it would be like as I continue to use this product. It is unscented and so is nice for those who don't like the potent smells of some of these lotions. Perhaps on the long run, continuing to use this product may keep my skin looking young.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Helps increase surface skin cell turnover to visibly reduce dull, uneven skin CICA (Centella Asiatica) | Helps restore the skin's moisture barrier to visibly plump and firm skin Helps Activate Sleeping Surface Skin Cells For Less Crepey Looking, Smoother Skin in 1 Week For Firmer Looking Skin in 4 Weeks

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this for my neck and dÃ©colletÃ©. I tried it on my face and I'm not sure I like it for a facial moisturizer, but I'm pretty picky about that with perimenopausal skin. This size container is convenient to take with for a weekend away.

reviews.title: Perfect for firming that neck region
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil skin activator hydrating and neck firming, chest face cream. It's perfect for on the go when you're feeling a little bit dry or just need some a hydration to your skin to make you look more alive. You can definitely tell a difference in the firming action if you continue to use it for a small period of time. It is unscented and rubs in very well without a sticky residue

reviews.title: Fragrance free hydration and firming cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love using this Cetaphil cream on my neck and chest. I do use it on my face, but for that, I wish it were a little less thick and creamy. I feel like my neck is really benefitting from the hydration and firming effect. And I love love the fact this cream is fragrance free. I saw a difference in my skin's hydration level after using this only one or two days.

reviews.title: New staple in my routine!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream on my face, neck, and chest for a couple of weeks now, and I can definitely see a difference in the firmness of my skin. While I haven't noticed much change yet with fine lines, I still absolutely love how it makes my skin feelâ€¦hydrated, smooth, and more youthful. It's gentle, effective, and has definitely earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine!

reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I don't like the smell of this cream, it smells like chemical. The cream is quite thick and a bit sticky. Had been applying it for 3 days both in the morning and evening, so far can't see any significant changes. Due to the strong smell of chemical, I do not recommend it.

reviews.title: Cetaphil
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This body cream is great. It's another amazing product from Cetaphil and I'm very happy with it. It's a brand that I trust and I use their facial cleanser on a daily basis. It's a thicker consistency but was easy and smooth to apply. Absorbs well into my skin and doesn't leave it greasy or oily. It is scentless so no smell and is great for those with sensitive noses or to put on or near my face. The tub is a generous size and since a little goes a long way, I can see it lasting me quite a while. If you like a body cream that feels extra nourishing without being heavy, this one's a winner.

reviews.title: Compact and non greasy firming lotion
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this product on my neck and have noticed results. The product is non greasy and no smell of chemicals or fake scents. The product is small enough to fit in a travel bag for a weekend away

reviews.title: Thick
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil neck, chest, and face cream is a really thick formula. It's very hydrating but it made my face greasy and caused a few breakout spots. I used less and it worked out better. A little bit goes a long way with this cream. It takes this formula longer to fully absorb due to it being so thick. The tube is very easy to dispense and store. It is unscented and very effective for hydrating your skin.

reviews.title: Great body lotion!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The pump bottle is very easy to use and control how much lotion is dispensed with each pump. The lotion has no smell at all and it's good for my sensitive nose. The lotion's texture is not thick, not thin either but it absorbs easily and fast, leaving no residue and a greasy feeling. I use it twice a day, especially after a warm bath so it will be absorbed deeper. My skin feels silky smooth ðŸ˜Œ after applying. So far my skin looks more moist, less scaling, healthier after three weeks of continued use of this lotion and firming cream. I recommend the Cerave product line for anyone sensitive but looking for effective results.

reviews.title: Hydrating and helping crepey skin!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Cream for the Face, Neck & Chest is a lightweight cream that doesn't leave behind any greasy or oily feeling. It absorbs quickly with no fragrance and great for sensitive skin too. It is made with centella asiatica & mandelic acid for increasing the skin's cell turnover and less crepey skin. It is instantly hydrating and will hydrate up to 48 hours as well as help repair the skins moistur barrier with long time use. Apply twice daily and it won't clog pores on the face. Perfect for hydration, smoothing, and plumping of crepey skin!

reviews.title: Not recommended for people with oily skin.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil hydrating and firming cream is a good product. It does leave your skin soft and smooth. Doesn't have much of a smell but is creamy. Nice tune makes it easy to apply. Does leave your skin oily though.

reviews.title: Smooth and dries quickly leaving no greasy feeling
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really liked this product and used it after cleansing my face. I used it on non-makeup days and under my makeup. It was smooth and didn't have a strong scent or no scent really. Dries quickly without a greasy feeling.

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am genuinely impressed with this product. While the packaging doesn't dazzle with its appearance, the cream inside dazzles with its effect on mine. This is terrific stuff! It applies smoothly, absorbs quickly, and really does improve the look of my face and neck. I can't believe a drugstore skincare offering gives me results as good as what I get from high end luxury brands. This is an outstanding product!

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm all for firming and hydrating creams but this one is just not for me. The texture is too tacky and somewhat sticky for me. I did not like how it felt on my skin after I applied it. It does have the right ingredients to help make your skin firmer if they could improve the texture of the cream, then I would definitely use this daily.

reviews.title: My neck and chest look youthful again
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I never paid much attention to my neck and chest before, but I decided to try the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream for those areas. In just a couple of days, I noticed my skin looked smoother and less crepey. Now, after consistent use, my neck feels firmer and more youthful. Definitely a must-have in my skincare routine!

reviews.title: Super firming
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this stuff, such a great moisturizer for the face super firming super hydrating for the skin. Has no scent which is great thing if you have sensitive skin, which I do. The Ingredients are super clean and the packaging explains it all.

reviews.title: Hydrating but irritated my skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Cream has a nice, smooth texture that feels moisturizing and leaves my skin soft, and the scent is barely noticeable, which I appreciate. That said, I've noticed some irritation when applying it to my neck and chest, so I mainly stick to using it on my face.

reviews.title: My skin feels great !
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The cream feels silky going on and gives instant hydration without being greasy. Those areas can sometimes look a little dry or crepey, but this has been helping them look smoother and more even. It's nice knowing I'm giving attention to spots I usually overlook in my skincare. After using it consistently, my skin looks healthier and feels a lot more comfortable day to day.

reviews.title: A New Favorite! Helps Form Neck and Chest
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I loved Ceraphil's Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck,Chest, and Face Cream! I feel like there aren't many products out there for the neck and chest even though it's an important area to take care of/can sag and age over time. The cream absorbed well, didn't cause any breakouts, and helped firm my neck and chest area. This is my favorite product from this lineup and I will continue to use!

reviews.title: Great face cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a really great face and neck cream. It is definitely a tad thicker than what I am used to, but it still works really well. I just have to use it sparingly on my face and neck. There is no scent so that is a bonus! Very moisturizing& I can notice subtle firming after a week of consistent use.

reviews.title: Hydrating neck cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Hydrating cream that I use on my chest and neck . I like the simple effective squeeze tube for travel and on the go. The cream scent is light, clean and the ingredients seem hydrating. Makes my skin appearance look less creepy.

reviews.title: My neck and chest are so moisturized and soft.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this hydrating & firming cream for my neck, chest and face. It definitely helps with firming on my neck and chest. I do not have crepey skin on my face, so I can't review that. It is easy to apply and goes on smoothly. It absorbs quickly. You have to be consistent. I usually apply once a day. I will definitely continue to use it to see if I notice more changes over time. Easy to squeeze tube with a flip top lid.

reviews.title: A Silky Shield That Locks in Hydration.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is a specific treatment for the areas that reveal signs of aging the fastest: the neck, chest, and face. The texture is silky and comfortableâ€”rich yet quickly absorbedâ€”leaving a delightful sensation on the skin. I loved adding this cream as the final step of my skincare routine because it feels like a protective shield that locks in all the products applied before, helping them absorb perfectly. With consistent use, I noticed firmer, more even-looking skin. It feels deeply nourishing without being heavy, making it an excellent companion for an anti-aging routine that includes active ingredients such as retinoids. This cream ensures long-lasting hydration that keeps the skin calm and balanced while using stronger treatments.

reviews.title: Added to my face routine! Perfect neck cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Since I'm approaching 40, I've become very eager to take care of my skin and firm things up. I was impressed with this Cetaphil hydrating and firming cream that is specified for use on your neck, chest and face. It's the perfect consistency and doesn't leave you feely slimey, like some creams do. I look forward to adding this to my routine!

reviews.title: Great product for aging skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Easy to carry around in purse and travel bag. I know its important to start young putting on products to help with skin later in life. I feel like this will be a benefit for sure but cant tell immediately. I do like the softness of the texture and doesn't leave a slime residue afterwards.

reviews.title: May become a staple
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So I have only been able to use this face and neck cream at night on my face, since it's richer than most and I have combo skin. I do wear it day and night on my neck which needs the help with firmness and I love it. It's rich and not that heavy and definitely helps smooth skin texture and helps it look more firm.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Obsessed with the cream for my evening routine. I'm starting to see a difference in my skin texture. It has no scent, which I love. The ingredients are minimal. I will be buying this product again when I'm done using it!

reviews.title: Targets delicate areas with hydration and firmness
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this cream on my neck, chest, and face every night, and I'm amazed by the results. The texture is smooth and creamy, but it absorbs quickly and doesn't leave a greasy feel. After a few uses, my skin looks noticeably firmer and more even-toned, especially around my neck area. It feels nourishing and gentleâ€”perfect for sensitive skin! Good package also.

reviews.title: Clean and easy to apply, results in a couple days
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is easy to apply. The packaging is nice and helps with use. I like the neutral scent with no lingering smells. It leaves the skin feeling smooth and not greasy or sticky even in hot weather. This gives my skin what it needs to feel and look good.

reviews.title: A good cream for hydration.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thank you @influenster & @cetaphil for sending me this complimentary Hydrating & Firming Cream Skin Activator in exchange for my honest opinion. I'm not sure if this is different from the cream in the jar because the ingredients look the same. The consistency is slightly different. The cream in the jar is very thick & this cream is slightly thinner, but not by much. This cream says it's for your face, neck & chest, but it's a little too thick for my face. I think it depends on your preference, but with the heat & humidity, it's just too thick for my face. I would probably like this more in the winter months. I like that this line is designed for mature & sensitive skin & that they are fragrance & paraben free. Overall, it's a good cream for hydration.

reviews.title: Nourishing, hydrating and helps my skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream goes on super smooth and is light feeling. It absorbs well and doesn't leave a greasy feel on my face, neck or chest. I'm really pleased with how well it has hydrated my skin. This is something I will definitely continue to use. The tube is easy to handle and has a flip top cap for easy dispensing. There isn't a scent so this would be good for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Very good working face, neck and chest cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] With getting older my skin needs more professional skin care. Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream it is great to restore skin's moisture barrier , activate sleeping cells for firmer, more hydrating skin. It has comfortable in usage big tube, has no scent.

reviews.title: The texture is the only issue I have.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] While using this cream, it does not seem to really absorb. The texture just feels like lotion is sitting on my face. Packing was good and easy to disperse. The scent was not overpowering at all either. As far as firming my skin, I don't think I really got that because I was not constant with it due to how it felt on my face.

reviews.title: Great for colder weather
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love how this product makes my skin feel highly moisturized and hydrated. It's just greasy and a little goes a long way. No scent detected. It is a little bit on the heavier side, but not thick. The texture is nice and smooth. This would be a great moisturizer for the colder months!

reviews.title: A great hydrating cream that helps certain areas o
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil makes great creams and you can use this on your face, neck, and chest to keep each area hydrated and feeling smooth. It is also scent free so that helps with something that stays near your face and neck area. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: New favorite cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm so impressed with how well this works and how amazing my skin feels after using it. My skin feels hydrated and soft and looks so good! I feel like this is a new staple that I will be using all the time!

reviews.title: A hug for your face
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great product for face neck and upper chest skin firming help. I felt that the lotion itself was a bit more watery than the other products but when it absorbed it did hydrate and feel great on the face. Would recommend for the packaging easy to go tube, and the light scent and feel of it.

reviews.title: Improves appearance!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've spent a few weeks using this plus two others in this product line. As someone with very crepey skin, I'm always desperate to find something that works, and I will absolutely keep buying this. I did not use this specific product on my face, but did use it on my chest. I'm unclear how this differs from the lotion (maybe the AHA concentration?) I may just use the lotion for my chest area moving forward, but I'll do some more research first. Overall, I recommend!

reviews.title: Neck Cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At 45, I've noticed my neck starting to show signs of aging with fine lines and a crepey look. The Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream has AHA (Mandelic Acid) to smooth uneven skin and CICA (Centella Asiatica) to restore firmness and moisture. After using it regularly, my neck feels more hydrated, looks firmer, and the skin is noticeably smoother.

reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using the Cetaphil Hydrating Firming Face, Neck & Chest Cream on my neck and chest (not my face) and really like it. It's not greasy, doesn't settle into the neck lines, and never feels uncomfortable. I use it every night and have noticed some small improvements in how my skin looks and feels. A solid option for neck and chest care.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using the Cetaphil skin activator, hydrating and firming cream for my face, neck and chest, and I am really impressed. The texture is lightweight, but still feels nourishing and it sinks and without leaving any greasiness my skin feels softer and more hydrated after a few weeks, I've noticed a smoother texture, especially on my neck. I don't feel any irritation and I would recommend this product.

reviews.title: Moisturizing but sticky after-feel!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product is ok. It is a hydrating and firming cream and my skin definitely felt hydrated after applying. However, my skin would feel a little sticky afterwards, which I didn't love. I liked the little tube it came in - that was a good size to keep on my counter. I didn't notice a huge difference in how my skin looked after using, but it definitely did seem more moisturized.

reviews.title: Bye crepey skin and hello glow!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil has done it again! The skin around my upper neck was worrisome as I am getting older. I doubted this product but as you can tell from my pictures, the skin on my neck and the glow on my face demonstrates the effectiveness of this product. The creams sinks in quickly and there is no odor. Thank you, Cetaphil!

reviews.title: Great firming cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This firming cream is fantastic! It has a nice right texture without being heavy or greasy on my skin. It leaves my skin nice and hydrated. I love that it's fragrance free and gentle on my skin. Perfect for aging skin!

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like the Cetaphil Skin Activator cream! First impression - it is a nice consistency. It is thick and hydrating. Perfect for your neck and chest. I haven't tried it on my face yet. I love that it has mandelic acid and cica. And it is fragrance free! I am excited to see the long term results! Cetaphil is a trusted brand- this product is wonderful.

reviews.title: Maybe too greasy for some skin types?
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product worked fine, but I did feel like it left my face feeling greasy. I think if I continued to use it, I would skip my face and only use on my neck and chest. It is a neutral scent, if that's helpful for certain people.

reviews.title: good cream, didn't notice a difference in texture
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use this a good bit on my neck and face for the last month or so. I personally did not experience a significant change in my skin appearance or texture during this time. It was a nice lotion and I enjoyed using it, but again it was nothing special for me and how it fixed appearance or texture problems. I will enjoy continuing to use it as I finish up the product, but I wouldn't buy again since it is specifically supposed to fix creepiness and firmness problems in the skin.

reviews.title: Wonderful cream.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream: This cream has become one of my favorites because since I've been using it for 3 weeks now I've noticed my skin is much more radiant and nourished as well as hydrated. It's a cream with mandelic acid and centella asiatica that helps renew skin cells which help firm and give it better elasticity. I'm using it every day on my entire face, neck and chest and I love it, it's a cream that surprises, it's a cream with a soft texture and light essence, my skin feels much softer plus I've felt that my poel feels less flaky in the neck area, it doesn't feel sticky or greasy and it moisturizes quickly into the skin. The packaging is very practical.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product thanks to Influenster and Cetaphil in exchange for my honest review. Lightweight and amazingly hydrating. I feel no scent on the cream. I use it every night and I'm very happy with the results.

reviews.title: Great for Am/Pm
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream i use morning and night on my neck and face. I noticed a difference the next morning. It was subtle but definitely noticeable. I love how moisturizing it is as well. It gives the skin a soft feel and the texture is thin so it doesn't feel heavy on the face. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a cream like this one.

reviews.title: Targeted Care for Face, Neck & Chest
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love that this cream is designed for the areas that show signs of aging first. It's rich but not heavy, and my skin feels smoother, firmer, and more hydrated after each use. Perfect for maintaining a youthful look across the face, neck, and dÃ©colletÃ©.

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very good for the areas I most concern be aging now. Love the packaging size , I will travel soon and want bring this with me. Like the ingredients and texture , not very strong scent too! So definitely love it !!!

reviews.title: Ok I guess
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Has a very thick, creamy texture. No fragrance at all, but does have a very subtle odor at first, but it dissipates after a few minutes. Does seem to moisturize skin, although I have only been using on hands and arms. I tried it on my face but I didn't like the feel of it at all. A bit greasy feeling as well.

reviews.title: Heavy and greasy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I did not like this product. Personal preference is I like scented products better. This felt greasy and heavy on my face. When I woke up in the morning I felt like I had to wash this off because it had not yet absorbed into my skin. I wouldn't recommend. I also broke out on my cheeks from it.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] A little goes a long way with this product. A small pea size amount is enough for my neck and chest. I love that it absorbs quickly. There is no scent but it does seem to help with keeping my skin firm.

reviews.title: Leaves your skin really rested and deeply hydrated
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream (Skin Activator) for 2 weeks now for my face and neck and I really like it. It feels super lightweight but still deeply moisturizing. What I noticed most is how smooth and soft my skin feels afterwards, without that greasy or sticky residue some creams leave behind. Does well with a toner on top but I let it absorb first. I love that it's fragrance-free, paraben-free, and hypoallergenic â€” perfect for me during pregnancy! Great and deep hydration, which is so crucial in our dry state on New Mexico! It actually feels like it helps with firmness and gives my skin a more rested, healthier look. I've been using it daily and already see a difference â€” especially on days when my skin feels tired or dry. It absorbs well and layers nicely under sunscreen or makeup too. Highly recommend if you're looking for a gentle but effective moisturizer that supports your skin barrier and leaves you feeling fresh and glowy.

reviews.title: Awesome product. Leaves skin supple.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] THIS cetephil product left my skin feeling supple and hydrated ALL day/night. A significant difference from my other reviews on cetephil, which were good, but lacking some longevity. It was used on my face, and didn't cause any rosacea flare up or irritation. The packaging was minimal and great. I will be buying this again!

reviews.title: Don't forget your neck!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] As a 46 year old woman, I am quite aware that I am going through the aging process right now. That does not mean that I can't help the hands of time go a little slower. One of the giveaways of age are definitely the neck and upper chest. I think people tend to overlook it, in their beauty regiments. This cream states that in 2 days, you'll start to see a difference and I definitely did. My neck does look less crepey. I like the application best on this one, out of all the offerings in this line. It was the least â€œmessyâ€ and came out smoothly from the tube, without distributing too much product. Did not cause any irritation or redness. Will definitely continue using it.

reviews.title: Obsessed!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] When I first started using the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream for my face, neck and chest I saw results within days. Every time I looked in the mirror I thought I looked different only to realize my skin was looking more even and supple. My under eyes even look less baggy. My face feels so hydrated and my crepey neck is less noticeable. It's a wonderful product!

reviews.title: Works Well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating and Firming Neck, Chest and Face Cream feels so soothing and luxurious. I've used it for a few days on my neck and chest. It really lessens the crepey look. I know with continued use, my skin will reap the full benefits.

reviews.title: Game changer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is a great multitasker! It's gentle yet effective at firming and smoothing delicate areas like the neck and chest. It absorbs well, provides lasting hydration, and has noticeably improved the texture and elasticity of my skin. A solid addition to any age defying skincare routine!

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I receivedCetaphil Hydrating and Firming Cream Skin Activator for free in exchange for my honest review I recently tried out the new Cetaphil Hydrating and Firming Cream for the first time. It has skin activator compounds that penetrate deep to activate sleeping cells that help to firm up the skin. I have only used this a short time and cannot say much about the firming aspect, but there are several other things I noticed and liked. It is a thick formula so it is not messy and it absorbed well into my skin. Since the formula is thicker, you only need a small amount to get the job done. I also personally liked that it had almost no scent to it as well. I have fragrances I like to put on myself and do not like having my lotion compete with them. Overall I am happy with it and my skin is left hydrated and soft after each use.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating and Firming Lotion delivers deep hydration while helping to visibly firm and smooth the skin. The lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling soft, plump, and refreshed without any residue. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and peptides, it supports skin elasticity and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines over time. Fragrance-free and gentle, it's ideal for daily use on sensitive skin, promoting a healthy, youthful glow with consistent application.

reviews.title: â€œCetaphil Neck, Chest & Face Cream feels just like
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I tried the Cetaphil cream made specifically for the neck, chest, and face, and honestly, I'm not sure if there's much of a difference compared to the regular Cetaphil hydrating body cream. The texture feels the sameâ€”smooth, light, and easy to apply. The main difference I noticed is really just the size of the packaging, but both leave my skin soft and hydrated. Still a solid product if you're a Cetaphil fan!

reviews.title: Nice for on the go
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is thicker than the lotion but not as thick as butter cream. I like to keep it on my bedside for before bed or throw it in my purse for on the go hydration. It works really well especially used daily and I enjoy that it doesn't have a scent. Definitely adding it to my routine for soft hydrating skin

reviews.title: Will be a winter favorite
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like the smaller tube for convenience and it takes up less space. I always appreciate great, effective products with skin-loving ingredients that are unscented. It's a little thick for my current oily skin. But I see it being a winter essential.

reviews.title: My Cetaphil Skin Activator Experience
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this cream for several weeks now and I'm really impressed with the results. The texture is lightweight yet nourishing, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue. My skin feels noticeably softer and more hydrated throughout the day, and I've started to see improvement in firmness around my neck and chest area. I love that it's gentle enough for sensitive skin while still being effective for mature skin like mine in my 40s. It has given my skin a smoother and healthier look, and I feel more confident about my overall appearance. This is definitely a product I'll keep in my daily routine.

reviews.title: Ingredients
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ Amazing Results with Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Crest and Face! I am absolutely in love with the texture of this creamâ€”it's rich yet lightweight, absorbing beautifully into the skin without any greasiness. The ingredients are top-notch, with a blend that truly hydrates and firms in all the right places. I especially appreciate that it's dermatologist-recommended and gentle on sensitive skin. The scent is light and clean, not overpowering at all, which makes it perfect for daily use. The packaging is sleek and easy to use, keeping the product fresh and mess-free. As for effectiveness, I noticed visible improvement in the firmness and hydration of my neck and face within just a couple of weeks. My skin feels smoother, more lifted, and refreshed. Highly recommend this product if you're looking to target early signs of aging with something that actually works!

reviews.title: This cream is fabulous!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using the Cetaphil Neck & Chest Firming Cream for a couple of weeks, and I'm genuinely impressed with the results so far. The cream has a rich, nourishing texture that absorbs quickly without feeling greasy. I apply it every night after my regular skincare routine, focusing on my neck, I've noticed my skin looks smoother and feels firmer especially in the morning. What I love most is that it's fragrance-free, and feels gentle even on sensitive skin. I highly recommend trying this cream. It's affordable, effective, and delivers visible results with consistent use.

reviews.title: Great nighttime cream for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have sensitive skin and am sensitive to fragrance, so I love that this didn't irritate my skin and is fragrance-free. The tube makes it easy to get the right amount out without any waste like a pump. This absorbed fully into my skin without feeling heavy. Keep in mind some makeup products might pill on top of this, depending on the base; make sure the makeup base is the same as this cream for best results if wearing makeup. This does not have any sun protection, so I prefer to apply this as my PM moisturizer. I don't have crepey skin but could use some firming; I didn't notice any changes in the texture of my skin, but maybe I needed to use it longer to see results.

reviews.title: Game-changer for hydration and firmness!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Cream on my neck, chest, and face, and the results have honestly surprised me. It's lightweight but incredibly hydrating, and my skin feels noticeably softer, smoother, and firmerâ€”especially in those delicate neck and dÃ©colletage areas where I usually see dryness or creasing. I love that it absorbs quickly, doesn't leave a greasy film, and works well under makeup or sunscreen. No irritation at all, even with my sensitive skin. After a couple of weeks of daily use, I can already tell my skin looks more plump and youthful, and the fine lines on my neck are less noticeable. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective firming moisturizer that targets more than just the face.

reviews.title: Use it everyday, and feel great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Cream! It keeps my skin soft, smooth, and deeply hydrated. After a week, my skin looks firmer and healthier. It's gentle, fragrance-free, and perfect for sensitive skin. I use it every day and feel great!

reviews.title: Firmer hydrated skin!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I been using this for a few weeks and can see a big difference in my face! I not only look and feel hydrated but the difference in firmness it so noticeable! I will definitely continue to use this daily!

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using both the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream and the Firming & Restoring Lotion for a few weeks, and I'm really impressed. The hydrating cream is rich and feels super nourishingâ€”perfect for dry or crepey areas like arms and legs. It soaks in well without feeling greasy and has noticeably improved the firmness and smoothness of my skin. The firming lotion is lighter and great for everyday use. I like using it on my neck and chest since it absorbs quickly and helps my skin look smoother and more toned. Neither product has a strong scent, which I appreciate, and both feel gentle on my sensitive skin. Overall, these are excellent options if you're looking for non-irritating, firming moisturizers that actually make a difference.

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is so good for my skin! Especially for my face. Love that it doesn't leave my skin feeling sticky or greasy but leaves it feeling super soft and smooth. I was breaking out on my chest and saw results quick once I applied this cream to my skin. It also has a good smell and texture. Love these products.

reviews.title: Soft texture, moisturizing, and improves skin appe
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoy this product. It has noticeabley improved the condition of my skin and makes it look healthy and more supple. The texture is very nice and gives your skin the right amount of moisture. The packing is simple and looks nice on the bathroom counter counter top. I would recommend this product.

reviews.title: Miracle Glow
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Wow! I used this at night as my moisturizer and after a week or so people kept commenting on my skin and appearance. Everyone was saying I had a glow! I noticed more even texture and color myself. This is light enough to use as a daily facial moisturizer and it doesn't feel heavy even with other products!

reviews.title: Gentle yet effective!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream Skin Activator is a great pick for aging skin. It deeply hydrates, helps improve elasticity, and leaves skin feeling smoother and firmer without any heaviness. Gentle yet effective â€” perfect for daily use on mature, sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Perfect for your face, neck, and chest.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest, & Face Cream feels luxurious on my skin. It is creamy and absorbs quickly. It leaves my skin hydrated and smooth. I love that it is specifically for my chest, neck, and face, which are all areas that I worry about showing damage as I get older. I also love that it is unscented, which is perfect for me. It is dermatologist recommended and good for sensitive skin, which is perfect for your face and neck. Overall, it is a fantastic lotion.

reviews.title: Perfect for winters.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoy using this neck, chest, and face firming cream. After using it regularly, I realized how much I had been neglecting my neck. It's very hydrating and has made my neck feel much smoother. The texture is soft but a bit thick for my face, since heavier products tend to break me out Still, its perfect to be used in winter when skin gets drier and needs extra hydration. I also like that it has no fragrance, so even people with sensitivity can use it. The compact packaging makes it easy to carry in my bag and use on the go. This cream is definitely staying in my routine.

reviews.title: Worth a try
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thick cream that absorbs quickly. Bo greasy feeling left behind. Does feel a little sticky when dry. Abused it on my face and neck and bo issues with breakouts. No scent which is great. Packaging makes it easy to use.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] A gentle face and neck cream with a medium consistency. It absorbs quickly and leaves skin firm and smooth. It has no strong odors. The tube makes it great to carry with you all day for easy reapplication.

reviews.title: Thick formula that absorbs fast!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream with CICA (Centella Asiatica) and AHA (Mandelic Acid) has a thick texture that absorbs quickly. I have been cleansing, applying a serum, and then applying a layer of the Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream to my face, neck, and chest. It gives an instant boost of moisture and with consistent use, it helps repair your skin barrier. My skin feels great, no breakouts or dry patches. I've noticed a big difference in my hands and the spot where my neck and chin meet. You get a lot of product in a convenient squeeze tube that lasts a long time.

reviews.title: A lightweight, fragrance-light cream that hydrates
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream has a silky-smooth texture that spreads easily and absorbs quickly without feeling greasy or heavy. The scent is minimal and pleasant, perfect for those who are fragrance-sensitive or prefer a neutral product. After consistent use, I noticed improved hydration and a firmer feel to my skin, especially on the neck and dÃ©colletage. It made the skin feel more supple and visibly smoother over time. The formula includes effective ingredients like peptides and niacinamide, which are great for improving elasticity and tone. I appreciate that the cream is gentle yet powerful enough to target delicate areas without irritation. The tube packaging is hygienic and travel-friendly, allowing for precise application. Overall, this is a great product to add to a skincare routine focused on firmness and hydration

reviews.title: So good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream has a rich, smooth texture that feels nourishing without being heavy. It spreads easily and absorbs quickly, leaving no greasy or sticky residue. My skin feels deeply hydrated and noticeably softer after each use. I also love that it's fragrance-free - it has no overpowering scent, just a clean, neutral feel and big packaging.

reviews.title: Great lotion for your aging skin.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] By far, this is my favorite facial lotion. It's thick and creamy, and it has made a noticeable difference in my skin. I've seen my face become firmer, the bags under my eyes diminish, and my crow's feet soften. I do have oily skin, and this lotion has increased that oiliness slightly. However, even with my sensitive skin, I was able to use it on my neck and around my ears without any irritation. A big plus, it has no perfumes scent and the tube package is great for traveling.

reviews.title: Great for aging skin!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is very hydrating. I like how it contains a gentle AHA (Mandelic Acid) to remove dead skin and increase skin turnover, plus Centella Asiatica (CICA) to soothe and restore skin's moisture barrier. As I'm getting older, I find my neck and chest needs something more to reduce crepey skin. I use this cream both morning and night and can see a change in firmness and skin looks more plump and smooth after continuous use. It absorbs into skin quickly and best of all, is unscented. I used a more expensive cream specifically for this area, but will definitely switch to this cream to hydrate and firm my neck and dÃ©colletage instead.

reviews.title: Moisture
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This face and neck cream has no scent and is full of moisture packed ingredients that over time should help skin elasticity and creepiness. The texture is super smooth and is the perfect step in my morning and nighttime skin routine.

reviews.title: Amazing cream for neck, face, chest that plumps &
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So happy Cetaphil developed firming cream specifically for neck, chest & face! It really made a difference with my skin feeling supple & glowy. I noticed a difference within a few days for my neck/chest area. I can wear lower neck clothing with confidence. I use twice a day, morning & night. I love the fact that it contains AHA to increase cell turnover which reduced fine lines. I even used this on my temples towards eye area to reduce laugh lines. I have the last laugh cuz my wrinkles are minimal. Cetaphil is definitely a game changer at a great price point. I suspect that I will reap more results in the coming winter months. I live in a cold state and get dry skin in the winter. When I take walks or run outside, I will apply the cream all over my face. This cream is ahhhhmazing.

reviews.title: Very hydrating neck cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use this cream at night on my neck and decolletage. I use this as a preventative anti-aging cream and so far I've noticed that my skin feels smoother and looks firmer. The cream is very thick, so a little goes a long way and the tube will last awhile.

reviews.title: Targeted Care for Neck, Chest & Face
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest, and Face Cream is a standout in my skincare lineup. The formula feels rich yet smooth, and it absorbs well without being heavy or greasy. I love that it's designed specifically for delicate areas like the neck and chest, which often need extra care. After using it consistently, I've noticed my skin feels firmer, more hydrated, and overall healthier-looking. It's also gentle and fragrance-free, so I don't have to worry about irritation. This cream gives me that extra boost of hydration while supporting firmness in areas that show signs of aging first.

reviews.title: No fuss, just results
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It goes on super smooth, feels light, and makes my skin feel way more hydrated without being greasy. My neck and chest don't look as dry or crepey, and my face feels softer too. I'm not expecting miracles, but I can definitely see a little firming action happening. It just makes my skin look healthier overall.

reviews.title: Love the results on my neck
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil's Skin Activator line promises visible rejuvenation for mature and dry skin and Cetaphil's Skin Activator Hydrating and Firming Neck, Chest and Face cream is no exception, it targets signs of aging on the neck, chest, and faceâ€”areas often neglected in my daily skincare routine. True to Cetaphil's brand, it's fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenicâ€”making it ideal for sensitive skin. I love that this is a multitasking product which has simplified my skincare routine. With prolonged use, i noticed that my skin appears tighter and smoother, especially around my neck. The cream is thick and little greazy and it does weigh down my skin a bit but I dont mind using it at night.

reviews.title: Great Daily Cream for Dry Skin!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this cream! I use it on my neck, chest, and face, and it feels smooth and light. After a few days, my skin looked softer and not as dry. It helped my skin feel firmer and more fresh, especially in areas that usually look tired. It has mandelic acid and CICA, which help smooth and calm the skin. There's no strong scent, which I like, and it's gentle enough for sensitive skin. I also love that it's fragrance-free and comes in a nice, easy-to-use jar. Great for daily care!
It was NOT on the shelf. I spent a Month looking, asking seeking it

reviews.title: Softer, firmer skin in convenient packaging
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil has always been one of my favorite brands and this hydrating & firming neck, chest and face cream is incredible. I love that its smaller packing profile makes it easy to take on the go. I've been using it every morning and some occasional evenings focusing on my neck and chest! My skin looks and feels so much softer and supple. I'm optimistic that I'll see an uptick in firmness, too, with consistent use. The one thing I really love is that it's fast absorbing and non-greasy.

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really love this set of skin, activator, hydrating, and firming neck check and face cream. It feels wonderful on my skin and I can tell it will make a difference in keeping it useful and firm looking.

reviews.title: Perfect little cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Amazing and perfect! It has kept my skin healthy and looks like I have not sat by the pool all summer. It has a light scent with a smooth texture and you'll never be worried about what's going on your skin.

reviews.title: Finally found something that works
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've recently lost 70 pounds and at the age of 35 loose skin is definitely something that I've been dealing with after seeing the product by Cetaphil which I'm already a Cetaphil user I was so excited to try this out. I have applied to my legs where I've noticed creepy skin, my neck, and also my arm, arms and face. I can definitely tell that it is working!! there's barely even a scent if any!!

reviews.title: Perfect for mature skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product jn exchange from my honest opinion. The entire Cetaphil package is great, I'm a little confused on the difference between the cream and the lotion because they have the same ingredients. I like the pump method better. These have glycerin which is a very underrated ingredient, but super effective for mature skin.

reviews.title: For firmer and less crepey skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil's hydrating and firming cream is a great addition to my everyday skin care routine. It is lightweight yet deeply moisturizing product. The texture is smooth and spreads effortlessly across the neck , chest and face , absorbing quickly without leaving any greasy residue. This fast-absorbing formula makes my skin feel soft, supple, and noticeably less crepey after application. It's lightly scented and adds a subtle freshness without being overpowering, and is gentle enough for aging skin . Designed to provide long-lasting hydration, this cream is perfect for daily use and works well for both the face, neck and chest. After just a few days of use the skin starts to look less crepey and more firmer . A must have .!!

reviews.title: Miracle cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was really pleasantly surprised by this cream. It's super rich and moisturizing while being minimally greasy. I put it on and my skin was instantly transformed. It dramatically improved my skins elasticity and texture with just one use. The scent is very mild and probably best described as unscented- although it does have a subtly pleasant, clinical scent to it. Like the really good stuff they give you at the dermatologist! Will definitely buy this again.

reviews.title: Simple and effective facial cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Simple and effective face and neck cream is perfect for AM skincare. This Cetaphil cream is has everything I need with mandelic acid and CICA without fragrance!

reviews.title: Hydrating
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like using this it hydrates the skin. It smells well. The texture is just perfect. It's not too runny and it's not too thick so it absorbs perfectly into my skin and the packaging is nice.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product is amazing. My neck,chest,and face feel so hydrated with this cream. I like how it's not oily and doesn't have a scent to it. It makes my skin feel really nice.

reviews.title: Nice for the chest and neck
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the scent of this cream and the texture. A few days using it and I like the results. The packaging is very practical. Good amount of product.

reviews.title: Fights aging skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great for face, neck and chest. Does not feel oily, feels hydrating and refreshing and fights aging skin! I like using this at night but could use it in the morning as well.

reviews.title: Worked well and made skin smoother
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest, & Face Cream worked very well. There was no scent which I liked. The lotion made my skin smoother immediately. I would recommend it.

reviews.title: Firming Hydration
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I found these products are best for Mature or very dry skin needing both hydration and a touch of firming. Great for use after showering or before bed

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Just the right size, the package was super good! Doesn't have any odor, is so soft and creamy for the neck and face. I've seen the changes so far, is really helping!

reviews.title: Awesome Product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Before: dry and dull. After: soft, smooth, and happy. I've used this product for a little over two weeks on my face, neck, and chest and I can really tell the difference! Very pleased!

reviews.title: Effective, neutral lotion!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product works. I've been using Sisley's neck lotion for years and I'm not kidding, this also stands the test of effectiveness â€” beautiful product. Smells like nothing, which I love!

reviews.title: Works
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is actually hydrating and firming as promised. I use it on my face and it layers nicely. Have not experienced any type of issues to date. Skin looks good.

reviews.title: Perfect for daily use
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was surprised how thick this cream was. It's definitely hydrating and doesn't dry up fast. There was a slight scent to it as well but overall not too strong. Skin feels great after application!

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This stuff is amazing. I havent using it very long but I am impressed with the results. The package was lovely and sealed. All soft ingredients. Love the smell. Its very light.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works great my skin is smooth and it took out the wrinkles! It works really good and safe ingredients I love it. Packaging is great and effective! No harsh scent. Love it

reviews.title: Cetaphil Cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pleasant texture and scent. This cream vontains active ingredients and moisturizes the skin perfectly. Safe packaging. An excellent product for effective everyday use.

reviews.title: Feeling younger!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream goes on light and feels great. It left my skin feeling smoother in just a few days. There is a slight scent that lingers due to rubbing it near my nose.

reviews.title: Holy grail face cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This scentless face cream is my new holy grail ! It applies thick but absorbs fast I have noticed a huge difference in my skin since using this product and will always repurchase .

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the packaging. The texture to this firming cream went on soft and smooth there no stickiness to it at all it dry up fast. The scent is so light. I love how it makes my face and neck look.

reviews.title: Great for mature skin for firming
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using the Cetaphil hydrating cream on my face and it really makes a difference in the fine lines and wrinkles. This thick moisturizer firms the skin on my neck and face.

reviews.title: Cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The cream absorbs well on skin without feeling greasy. The cream shows fragrance free, but I feel it has light scent. My skin feels soft & smooth.

reviews.title: Liked and recommend
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Needed some time to get used to it texture, like more smooth. Nice fragrant. Packaging ok. After two weeks of using skin is good and smooth. Likes

reviews.title: Light, fragrance free moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] No scent and easy to apply. Very light, but moisturizing. Absorbes into the skin quickly and leaves my face and neck soft without feeling greasy. I like that it's in a tube instead of a pump.

reviews.title: Takes a bit to work
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It went on unevenly. I had to keep rubbing it into my neck until it was absorbed. Does feel clean and light. Not heavy on my skin. I haven't noticed any difference with twice daily use

reviews.title: Happy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] There is no scent. The ingredients is better than some I've bought before. The texture is creamy and smooth. It has helped my face and neck. The packaging was nicely done.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product is thicker but it is easy to spread. The product feels firming on my face and body. There isn't much of scent to it, it also doesn't leave a greasy feeling.

reviews.title: Cetaphil firming cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Sensitive skin fragrance free product I used in face and chest. Product has no scent and is not greasy. It has worked well to reduce fine lines on my face. This will be my new go to!

reviews.title: Hello younger looking skin.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Take tired and saggy skin and make it supple and strong. Consistency is kind of thick. Fits easily in your purse and no smell. This stuff works amazingly.

reviews.title: I love this cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love ice cream. I love the packaging. It's not big or small. I could fit it in my purse. It's good for sensitive skin and aging skin. Would use again.

reviews.title: Not for the face!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a nice face/neck/chest cream, I love using it more for my neck and my chest though. I felt it was too sticky and thick for my face. Would definitely recommend but not for the face.

reviews.title: Non greasy great for everyday use!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love that it's fragrance free perfect for my sensitive skin. Not greasy absorbs quickly. Travel friendly packaging. Definitely notice a difference after using a week.

reviews.title: Works good .
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Goes on smoothly, run in well . Use as directed. Smells good . Seems to work like it is supposed to . Would definitely use buy . Reasonable price . Try it you will like it .

reviews.title: Effective on face
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This worked really well with the texture of my face. It firmed areas quickly and left my skin smooth. It enhances the appearance of your skin and left me wanting to buy the product on my own

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The active ingredients for Cetaphils skin activator hydrating and firming neck, chest, face is packed with powerful yet gentle ingredients. Scent neutral and texture is very smooth.
